title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: The label height does not update immediately after modifying the label font size.
EB: The label height should update to reflect the new font size when it is modified.
SR:
1. Add a label to the UI.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be 18 points.
